AidTypeVocabulary.name: OECD DAC
AidTypeVocabulary.description: List of codes provided by the OECD DAC used to distinguish types of aid

AidTypeVocabulary.name: Earmarking Category
AidTypeVocabulary.description: This vocabulary has been created by IATI and is derived from the Grand Bargain Earmarking Modality codelist

AidTypeVocabulary.name: Earmarking Modality
AidTypeVocabulary.description: Codes A to L replicated directly from Grand Bargain document found in Annex 1 (pg.16)

AidTypeVocabulary.name: Cash and Voucher Modalities
AidTypeVocabulary.description: This vocabulary has been created by IATI, following agreements and recommendations of the Tracking Cash and Voucher Assistance (CVA) Working Group.
